description: A port town in Arabasta where the Marines gathered after the defeat of Crocodile. It serves as a departure point from the kingdom.

keyEvents.title: Hina Greets Smoker at Tamarisk
keyEvents.description: Captain Hina meets Smoker and his Marine unit at the port town of Tamarisk, revealing their long-standing friendship.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Hina makes her debut and where key discussions about justice take place.

keyEvents.title: Marines Arrive at Tamarisk
keyEvents.description: Smoker, Tashigi, and their Marine unit arrive at Tamarisk to regroup after the Arabasta incident.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Tamarisk as the Marines' gathering point for departure from Arabasta.

keyEvents.title: World Government Cover-Up Discussion
keyEvents.description: At Tamarisk, Marine Headquarters contacts Smoker about falsely crediting him with Crocodile's defeat, leading to heated discussions about justice.
keyEvents.significance: The setting for major revelations about government corruption and different philosophies of justice.

keyEvents.title: Smoker Refuses Promotion at Tamarisk
keyEvents.description: At Tamarisk, Smoker angrily rejects the promotion offered by Marine Headquarters, denouncing the cover-up.
keyEvents.significance: The location of one of Smoker's most defining character moments.

statusHistory.reason: Port town remains active and operational
